remarks: Subspace orthocomplement for ` DVecH ` vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dochval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dochval.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
dochval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
dochval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochval.n $e |- N = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochfval $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> N = ( x e. ~P V |-> ( I ` ( ._|_ ` ( G ` { y e. B | x C_ ( I ` y ) } ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d K x y $.
$d V x $.
$d W x y $.
